original_text: The Lord your God has promised to give you more and more land. When he does that, perhaps you will say, ‘I would like to eat some meat.’ Then you may eat as much meat as you like.
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 허락하신 대로 네 지경을 넓히신 후에 네 마음에 고기를 먹고자 하여 이르기를 내가 고기를 먹으리라 하면 네가 언제나 마음에 원하는 만큼 고기를 먹을 수 있으리니

sentences.original_text: The Lord your God has promised
to give you more and more land
sentences.korean_translation: 너에게 점점 더 많은 땅을 주시려고

sentences.original_text: 'I would like to eat some meat'
as much meat as you like
